amendment.description: To provide that requirements on coverage of the costs of instruction at the Naval Postgraduate School shall also apply with respect to costs of instruction at the Air Force Institute of Technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 829 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 829 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S6921; text: CR S6921) To provide that requirements on coverage of the costs of instruction at the Naval Postgraduate School shall also apply with respect to costs of instruction at the Air Force Institute of Technology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 829 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 829 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Voinovich.
